last_episode_to_air.name: Honesty
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jim deals with the fall out of being shot by a heckler and considers quitting comedy. Billy goes to a video game tournament.

name: Legit
overview: Jim Jefferies, an edgy, foul-mouthed stand-up comedian from Australia, in his mid-30s and living in LA, is endeavoring to make his life and career more “legit,” only to find it a difficult, uncomfortable uphill struggle every step of the way. Jim is encouraged in his quest by Steve, his neurotic best friend and roommate, a cyber-law library salesman who struggles to stay on his feet in the wake of a divorce, and Steve’s brother Billy, who suffers from advanced staged Muscular Dystrophy and is confined to a wheelchair.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Legit is about a comedian, Jim" and his misguided attempts to become legitimate in life. He is encouraged in his quest by his best friend Steve, and Steve's brother Billy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Jim is outed as a sex addict on live radio as the second season of "Legit" kicks off. Later, Billy tags along when Jim and Steve attend their high-school reunion, the guys visit a water park with their dads, and Jim entertains soldiers in Afghanistan. Bob Saget, Carrie Fisher and Tom Arnold make appearances along the way.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Jim Jefferies, taking his first baby steps toward legitimacy and trying to do a good deed, treats his close friend Billy — suffering from advanced stage Muscular Dystrophy and confined to a wheelchair — to a debauchery filled road trip to a whorehouse in Las Vegas.

episodes.name: Dreams
episodes.overview: Jim and Steve decide to break Billy out of his adult care facility to party for one more night but their plan goes awry when they are forced to take Billy’s mentally challenged roommate, Rodney, along for the ride.

episodes.name: Love
episodes.overview: Jim and Steve create a fake online dating profile to help Billy meet girls; Steve goes to a bar and tests out Jim's pick-up strategies on a co-worker.

episodes.name: Anger
episodes.overview: In an effort to do something nice for Steve, Jim invites him along to a gig in Omaha — but once they get on the plane Jim gets embroiled in a battle with another passenger about plane etiquette and a middle seat.

episodes.name: Justice
episodes.overview: Jim, Billy, and Steve are attacked in their home by two men who think they are drug dealers. The two men are put on trial as Steve, Jim, and Billy recall the events and testify against them.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.overview: Jim is rejected from a youth-mentoring program. Later, Steve makes an unexpected discovery about his ex-wife.

episodes.name: Health
episodes.overview: After missing out on a role because of his weight, Jim turns to his good friend Andy Dick for some career advice, acting lessons and physical training. Jim ends up ruining the trainer.

episodes.name: Hoarders
episodes.overview: While running an errand with Steve and Billy, Jim discovers Janice has become a hoarder, forcing her husband Walter to live outside. In a misguided intervention, Jim uncovers more family secrets.

episodes.name: Bag Lady
episodes.overview: Jim’s house is swarmed by paparazzi after he beds a celebrity. To sneak her out of the house, he talks her into crawling into a suitcase and taking a ride in the trunk of his car.

episodes.name: Cuckoo's Nest
episodes.overview: Jim goes to volunteer at Billy’s adult care facility but his attempt goes wrong when Rodney escapes and Jim pisses off disabled patients by hitting on an attractive nurse that they all love.

episodes.name: Hat Hair
episodes.overview: Jim, Steve, Billy and Rodney go to a minor league baseball game. When Jim refuses to remove his hat for a patriotic anthem, a political melee ensues.

episodes.name: Misunderstood
episodes.overview: An actress accuses Jim of attempted rape. Later, Steve's wife and daughter move to Cincinnati.

episodes.name: Fatherhood
episodes.overview: A prostitute claims to be pregnant with Billy's baby in the first-season finale.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Legit is about a comedian, Jim" and his misguided attempts to become legitimate in life. He is encouraged in his quest by his best friend Steve, and Steve's brother Billy.

episodes.name: Loveline
episodes.overview: Jim is outed as a sex addict on live radio and battles his porn addiction at home.

episodes.name: Death
episodes.overview: One of Billy's friends with muscular dystrophy dies forcing the realization on the guys that Billy doesn't have much time left. Jim copes by chasing after the dead guy's sister.

episodes.name: Racist
episodes.overview: Jim realizes the girl of his dreams is a racist and must decide if he can tolerate her bigotry. The rest of the gang heads to a bar and gets into trouble.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: When Jim and Steve attend their high school reunion, they find things aren't quite as they remembered. Billy tags along and poses as an able-bodied alumnus.

episodes.name: Checkmate
episodes.overview: The van is towed with Billy in it while Walter and Steve go out drinking. Billy's wheelchair is stolen by gang members and Jim and Steve help him get it back.

episodes.name: Rub 'N' Slide
episodes.overview: Jim's parents come to visit and the guys' dads take them to a water park - along with hookers they met at a massage parlor.

episodes.name: Afghanistan
episodes.overview: To escape his parents, Jim goes to Afghanistan to entertain the troops and comes under heavy fire with Steve. Billy is hospitalized with Jim's mom.

episodes.name: Homeless
episodes.overview: Walter goes missing after walking in on Billy having sex. The boys search for him and discover one of Janice's secrets.

episodes.name: Licked
episodes.overview: Jim performs a sexual act to get a female executive in Hollywood to help him land roles.

episodes.name: Weekend
episodes.overview: Steve's daughter comes to visit from Cincinnati but a revelation about his ex-wife sends Steve into an out of control bender. His absence forces Jim into the unlikely role of surrogate parent for the weekend.

episodes.name: Intervention
episodes.overview: Janice and Walter stage an intervention to confront Steve's drinking unaware of a coke party Jim has accidentally set in motion in his bedroom.

episodes.name: Sober
episodes.overview: Jim stops drinking in solidarity with Steve and starts to suffer from panic attacks. Through a misunderstanding, Jim ends up at a married ex-girlfriend's house for a costume party.

episodes.name: Honesty
episodes.overview: Jim deals with the fall out of being shot by a heckler and considers quitting comedy. Billy goes to a video game tournament.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Jim is outed as a sex addict on live radio as the second season of "Legit" kicks off. Later, Billy tags along when Jim and Steve attend their high-school reunion, the guys visit a water park with their dads, and Jim entertains soldiers in Afghanistan. Bob Saget, Carrie Fisher and Tom Arnold make appearances along the way.
